author: Special Correspondent
text:
Fresh applications for passports in normal category submitted with three documents - Aadhar card, Elector’s Photo Identity Card and PAN card - and an affidavit in the form of Annexure – I, will be processed and passports will be issued. The police verification will be done subsequently. However, this is subject to online validation of these documents.

According to a release from Passport Office, Ministry of External Affairs, the following documents are also mandatory for the issue of fresh passport: birth certificate/school certificate for proof of age, marriage certificate/Annexure ‘D’ for proof of marital status and certificate for educational qualification, proof for ECNR.
title: Passport norms on documents relaxed
